Name: Stele of the songstress of Amun Ankhmutnofret
Description: A winged solar disk is shown in the round top of the stele; it is separated from the lower part by a decorated horizontal band. In the main section, below, is an image of Osiris with the Atef-crown and was scepter, followed by the goddess Isis with her symbol on her head and a ribbon in her left hand. On the right, the deceased is shown, her hands lifted in adoration. In the middle there are a jug and a lotus flower on a high stand.
